```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(igraph)

rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))


vis<-function(resultFolder,fileVal,dataset){
  fName<- paste(resultFolder,fileVal,".txt",sep="")
  
  ex <- read.table(file=fName, header=TRUE,sep="\t")
  effect<-ddply(ex,.(seed),summarise,V1=mean(mean/avgGraphDeg),V2=mean(varianceOfBootStrapDegrees))
  
   effect<-cbind(effect,dataset)
  
  return(effect)
}
 vals =c("orange","blue", "green")
resultFolder<-"C:/Users/cxa123230/IdeaProjects/GraphBoot/results/"
 o1<-vis(resultFolder,"expenron" ,"Enron")
 o2<-vis(resultFolder,"expDBLP" ,"Dblp")
 o3<-vis(resultFolder,"expfacebook" ,"FB")
  
 df<-data.frame(o1)
 df<-rbind(df,o2)
 df<-rbind(df,o3)
  m11<-ggplot(df, aes(x=seed,y = V1,color=dataset,group=dataset))+geom_line(size=2)+scale_y_continuous(name=expression(paste(bar(x)," / ",mu)))+scale_color_manual(values=vals) 
m11

```

graphDblp<-read_graph("C:/Projects/DisagioData/facebook-links.txt", directed = FALSE,format ="edgelist")
distDblp<-degree_distribution(graphDblp)
d<-data.frame(distDblp)
d$length<-seq(1,length(distDblp))
ggplot(d,aes(x=length,y=distDblp))+geom_line()+scale_x_log10()+xlim(0,100)

 
 
graphEnron<-read_graph("C:/Projects/DisagioData/Email-Enron.txt", directed = FALSE,format ="edgelist")
